src_text: ka ditiro tša bona, ba aga lefase leo le nago le toka kudu, leo le lekalekanyago batho, leo le tšwelago pele go ya go ile la go ba le khutšo.
tgt_text: bangumtfombo welusikisiki nelitsemba.

src_text: bafsa go ralala le lefase ba ipiletša go dihlongwa go emiša semorafe le go hlokiša dihlopha tše dingwe setšhabeng menyetla.
tgt_text: lusha lwaseningizimu afrika lungumtfombo welusikisiki nelitsemba vukuzenzele unnamed emavi afrantz fanon latsi ‘leso naleso situkulwane kufanele kutsi sititfolele inchubombono yaso’ afika njalo engcondvweni yami nakumele kutsi ngikhulume nebantfu labasha baseningizimu afrika.

src_text: mma yo a nago le bolwetše bja covid19 silusapho nyanda insaaf mohammed o re go bohlokwa kudu go maafrika borwa, kudukudu bao ba nago le malwetši ao a iphihlilego, go rwala maikarabelo go maphelo a bona.
tgt_text: make lonekugula laphila nako wehlula icovid19 silusapho nyanda insaaf mohammed utsi kubaluleke kakhulu kutsi bantfu baseningizimu afrika ikakhulu labo labaphila nekugula kutsi banakekele timphilo tabo.

src_text: batho bao ba nago le malwetši ao a iphihlilego – a go swana le asema, bolwetši bja madi a magolo, bolwetši bja dipshio bja go se fole le bolwetši bja swikiri – ba ka itemogela go fetelela ga maswao a bolwetši bja coronavirus (covid19), gomme ba ka hlokofala ka lebaka la kgatelelo yeo bolwetši bjo bo e tlišago mebeleng ya bona.
tgt_text: bantfu labanekugula labaphila nako – njengesifuba semoya, ihayihayi, sifo setinso nesifo sashukela – bangahlangabetana netimphawu teligciwane lecorona (icovid19) letimatima kakhulu, futsi bangashona ngenca yebumatima lobubangwa nguleligciwane emitimbeni yabo.

src_text: ka mahlatse, ge setsebi sa malwetši a mešomong sa ka cape town le mma wa bana ba bararo insaaf mohammed (40) diteko di laetša gore o na le baerase ya covid19 ge a babja a na le asema, o ile a kgona go laola malwetši a ka bobedi gomme ga se a babja kudu.
tgt_text: ngenhlanhla, ngesikhatsi ingcweti yekunakekela ngetemphilo lesekapa nalongumake webantfwana labatsatfu insaaf mohammed loneminyaka lenge40 ngesikhatsi atfolakala kutsi unalo neligciwane lecovid19 ngesikhatsi agula aphetfwe sifuba semoya, wakhona kutsi atilawule totimbili letimo akazange agula kamatima.

src_text: mohammed o fetetšwe ke covid19 go tšwa go monna wa gagwe, yo a šomago ka laporathoring ya sepetleleng sa groote schuur.
tgt_text: mohammed wasuleleka ngecovid19 ayitfola kumyeni wakhe, losebenta elabhorethi esibhedlela egroote schuur.

src_text: morwa wa mohammed yo a nago le mengwaga ye šupa le yena diteko di laeditše gore o na le baerase ye.
tgt_text: indvodzana yamohammed leneminyaka lesikhombisa nayo yatfolakala inalo leligciwane lecovid19.

src_text: ka morago ga gore diteko di laetše gore o na le baerase ye, boraro bja bona ka moka ba ile ba ipeela thoko ka gae gore ba se kopane le batho ba bangwe.
tgt_text: emva kwekutsi sebatfolakele kutsi banaleligciwane, bobatsatfu batehlukanisa bahlala ngekwehlukana khona lapho ekhaya.

src_text: "re ile ra ipeela thoko ka phapošing ya rena ya go robalela, mola e le gore matswale yena – yo a nago le bolwetši bja swikiri le bolwetši bja madi a magolo ka mahlatse a se a fetelwa ke baerase ye – a ile a hlokomela bana ba rena ba babedi," gwa bolela mohammed.
tgt_text: "satehlukanisa ekamelweni letfu lekulala, ngesikhatsi maketala wami – lonesifo sashukela kanye nehayihayi siyabonga kutsi yena akazange asuleleka ngaleligciwane – wanakekela lalabanye lababili bantfwana betfu," kusho yena njalo mohammed.

src_text: go ya ka kgoro ya maphelo ya kapa bodikela, batho bao ba nago le bolwetši bja madi a magolo, ba bolwetši bja swikiri le ba bolwetši bja dipshio bja go se fole ke bao ka tllwaelo ba tshenywago ke covid19.
tgt_text: ngekusho kwelitiko letemphilo lasenshonalanga kapa, bantfu labanesifo sehayihayi, sashukela kanye nesifo setinso basemkhatsini walabo labanekugula labaphila nako labahlaselwa yicovid19.

src_text: go thoma ka la 25 mopitlo, batho bao ba nago le malwetši ao a latelago a go iphihla ba laeditše maswao a kotsi: bolwetši bja madi a magolo, 58% bolwetši bja swikiri, 56% bolwetši bja dipshio bja go se fole, 17% hiv , 16% asema goba bolwetši bja go hema bja go se fole, 15% bolwetši bja pelo, 11% mmele o mogolo, 13% tb, 13% kankere, 2% malwetši a mangwe a go se fole, 16%.
tgt_text: kusukela mhla tinge25 inkhwekhweti, bantfu labanekugula labaphila nako lokulandzelako bakhombisa timphawu letimatima: ihayihayi, emaphesenti lange58 sifo sashukela, emaphesenti lange56 sifo setinso, emaphesenti la17 ihiv , emaphesenti la16 sifuba semoya nome sifo sekuphefumula, emaphesenti la15 sifo senhlitiyo, emaphesenti la11 kuzimuka kakhulu, emaphesenti la13 sifo sesifuba, emaphesenti la13 umdlavuta, emaphesenti lamabili letinye tifo letitsatsa sikhatsi lesidze kwelapheka, emaphesenti la16.

src_text: mohammed o bolela gore letšhogo la gagwe le legolo e bile ge a hlakahlakana a palelwa ke go hema ka lebaka la covid19.
tgt_text: mohammed utsi kwesaba kwakhe lokukhulu kwaba kuhlangabetana netinkinga tekuphefumula ngenca yalecovid19.

src_text: "ke ile ka itemogela go lapa, go gohlola le go ngangega ga maswafo, fao go ilego gwa rarollwa ke pompi ya ka ya asema.
tgt_text: "bengiva kudzinwa, ngikhwehlela kanye nekucinana esifubeni, ngasitwa sifutfo sami sesifuba semoya.

src_text: maswao a ka ga se a mpefala go swana le a monna wa ka, yo a ilego a ba le dihlabi mmeleng, a sellega, a ba le maswafo a go ngangega, go felelwa ke moya, disaenase tše di thibanego, sehuba se sekoto mafahleng a gagwe le go ﬁ ša ga mmele.
tgt_text: timphawu tami betingasimatima njengatemyeni wami, labekadze eva buhlungu emtimbeni, ayabuleka, sifuba lesicinene, kuphelelwa ngumoya, kuvimbana sikhwehlela lesishubile esifubeni kanye nemkhuhlane.

src_text: morwa wa ka o bile le go ﬁ ša ga mmele matšatši a mararo, eupša o ile a fola ka pela kudu ge a se na go fenya maswao a gagwe," a realo.
tgt_text: indvodzana yami yaphatfwa yimfiva emalanga lamatsatfu, kodvwa walulama ngekushesha emva kwekutsi asancobe timphawu takhe," kwasho yena njalo.

src_text: ba lapa la bo mohammed ba ile ba obamela ditshepedišo ka moka tša pabalelo ya maphelo ka mošomong le ka gae, go efoga gore ba se ke ba fetelwa ke baerase.
tgt_text: umndeni wamohammed bewusolo utilandzela tonkhe tinyatselo tetekuhlanteka emsebentini nasekhaya, kute bagweme kwesuleleka ngaleligciwane.

src_text: "ba lapa la ka ba be ba kwešiša, ba kgathala ebile ba na le thekgo, gomme ba re tlišetša dijo tša mantšiboa bošegong bjo bongwe le bjo bongwe, eupša ka dinako tše dingwe setšhaba sa geno se ka no se kgathale ka wena gomme tshenyo ye e bakwago ke kgašo ya setšhaba e a tšhoša," gwa bolela mohammed.
tgt_text: umndeni wami bewuvisisa, unakekela futsi usisekela, futsi bewusiletsela kudla kwakusihlwa onkhe malanga ntsambama, ngalesinye sikhatsi ummango ungakhombisa kunganakekeli kanye nekulimalalokubangwa tinkhundla tekuchumana kuyetfusa," kusho yena njalo mohammed.

src_text: kgoro ya maphelo ya kapa bodikela e bolela gore go dula o nwele meetse le go hlokomela tlelukhose ya gago ya ka mading le thempheretšha ya mmeleng go bohlokwa go laola covid19, kudukudu go balwetši bao ba nago le malwetši a go iphihla.
tgt_text: litiko letemphilo lasenshonalanga kapa litsi kuhlala njalo unatsa emanti futsi ugadze lizinga lashukela engatini, kanye nesicindzetelo sengati nelizinga lekushisa tintfo letimcoka ekulawuleni icovid19, ikakhulu kubantfu labaphila nekugula.

src_text: godimo ga fao, kgoro ye e eletša batho bao ba nago le malwetši a go iphihla: go nwa dihlare ka maleba, go ya ka fao ba laetšwego ke mošomi wa tlhokomelo ya maphelo.
tgt_text: kwengeta kuloko, litiko leluleka bantfu labaphila nekugula kutsi: banatse imitsi yabo kahle, njengaloku bancunyelwe sisebenti setekunakekela ngetemphilo.

src_text: go hlapa diatla tša bona ka sesepa le meetse bonyane metsotswana ye 20, pele ga ge o ka kgoma dihlare.
tgt_text: geza tandla takho ngemanti lanensipho lokungenani imizuzwana lenge20, ngembikwekutsi utsintse nome ngabe ngumuphi umutsi.

src_text: go se emiši go nwa dihlare ka ntle le ge mošomi wa tlhokomelo ya maphelo a go botša gore o emiše go di nwa ebile o se fane ka dihlare tšeo le motho yo mongwe.
tgt_text: ungayekeli kunatsa umutsi wakho ngaphandle kwekutsi sisebenti lesinakekela ngetemphilo sikutjele kutsi wente njalo futsi ungashiyelani nalomunye ngemutsi wakho.

src_text: go leka go itšhidulla metsotso ye 30 ka letšatši.
tgt_text: linga kutsi utivocavoce imizuzu lenge30 ngelilanga.

src_text: kgoro e bolela gore batho bao ba nago le bolwetši bja swikiri ba na le sebaka se segolo sa go itemogela go hlakahlakana ga bolwetši ka lebaka la covid19, eupša kotsi ya go babja kudu e fasana ge e le gore bolwetši bja swikiri bja motho bo laolega gabotse.
tgt_text: litiko litsi bantfu labanesifo sashukela banematfuba lasetulu ekuhlangabetana netinkinga ngenca yecovid19, kodvwa bungoti bekutsi bagule kakhulu buncane nangabe shukela wabo bawulawula kahle.

src_text: "ka kakaretšo, batho bao ba nago le bolwetši bja swikiri go na le kgonagalo ye kgolo ya go itemogela maswao ao a mpefetšego kudu le go hlakahlakana ga bolwetši ge ba ka fetelwa ke baerase ye.
tgt_text: "jikelele nje, bantfu labanesifo sashukela bahlangabetana kakhulu netimphawu letimatima kanye netinkinga nangabe basuleleke ngaleligciwane.

src_text: ka ge batho bao ba nago le bolwetši bja swikiri ba le kotsing ye kgolo ya gore covid19 e ka mpefala, go tšwela pele go tlogela sekgoba gareng ga batho go a šišinywa ge go kgonagala.
tgt_text: bantfu labanesifo sashukela banebungoti lobusezingeni lelisetulu lekubanecovid19 lematima, ngakoke bayakhutsatwa kutsi bachubeke ngekutichelelanisa nalabanye bantfu nome kungasondzelani ngekwetenhlalo nakwenteka.

src_text: go ba le mmele o mogolo le gona go kotsi gore covid19 e ka mpefala.
tgt_text: kantsi nekuba nemtimba lomkhulu kakhulu kuyimbangela yebungoti becovid19 lematima.

src_text: go sesefala mmeleng, ge go kgonagala, ka fao go a šišinywa.
tgt_text: kwehlisa sisindvo semtimba, nangabe kwenteka, ngakoke kuyakhutsatwa.

src_text: "go phela gabotse mmelengka morago ga go dula a nnoši mo matšatšing a 14, mohammed o ile a boela mošomong.
tgt_text: "kuhlala unakekela temphilongemuva kwekuhlala yedvwa emalanga la14, mohammed wabuyela emsebentini.

src_text: o bolela gore go fola go baerase ye go ile gwa fetoša ka fao a naganago ka gona le ka fao a bonago bophelo ka gona.
tgt_text: utsi kwelulama emva kwekuhlaselwa nguleligciwane kwagucula indlela yakhe yekucabanga kanye neliso lekubuka imphilo.

src_text: "o bona bohlokwa bja ba lapa la gago le dilo tše nnyane bophelong.
tgt_text: "udvumisa umndeni wakho kanye netintfo letincane emphilweni kakhulu.

src_text: ke nyaka batho ka seemong sefe goba sefe sa mošomo go rwala maikarabelo go maphelo a bona le go ruta ba malapa a bona le bana ba bona, kudukudu ka gore mo lebakeng le bana ba boetše sekolong.
tgt_text: ngifuna kutsi bantfu nome ngabe ngukuyiphi indzawo yekusebenta kutsi banakekele imphilo yabo futsi bafundzise imindeni yabo kanye nebantfwana, ikakhulu nyalo njengaloku bantfwana sebabuyele etikolweni.

src_text: "thuša ngwana wa gago go hwetša ditsela tša boithomelo tša go laetša lerato go bagwera ba gagwe, ka ntle le go batamela le go kgoma batho ba bangwe.
tgt_text: "sita umntfwana wakho kutsi atfole tindlela leticanjiwe tekukhombisa lutsandvo kubangani babo, ngaphandle kwekusondzela kanye nekutsintsana.

src_text: botša ba lapa la gago gore ba tloše ditwatši go bona pele ga ge ba tsena ka gae, tlogela dieta tša gago ka karatšheng ge o ka kgona, apola diaparo tša gago ka moka gomme o hlape mmele pele ga ge o dumediša ba lapa la gago gomme o hlokomele tša maphelo kudu gore o ba šireletše," a realo.
tgt_text: yenta siciniseko kutsi umndeni wakho utichela ngesibulalimagciwane ngembikwekutsi ungene ekhaya, shiya ticatfulo takho egalashi nawukhona, khumula tonkhe tembatfo takho bese ugeza umtimba ngembikwekutsi ubingelele umndeni wakho futsi nakekela kakhulu temphilo kute ubavikele," kusho yena.

src_text: kgoro e eletša batho bao ba nago le malwetši a go iphihla go ja dijo tša phepo, ba itšhidulle kgafetšakgafetša, ba laole kgatelelo ya bona ya monagano, ba obamele leano la bona la kalafo ya maphelo le go latela magato ka moka a thibelo ya malwetši.
tgt_text: litiko leluleka bantfu labaphila nekugula kutsi badle kudla lokunemphilo, bativocavoce njalo, balawule sitresi sabo, bangaluyekeli luhlelo lwabo lwetekwelashwa futsi balandzele tonkhe tinyatselo letidzingekile tekutivikela.

src_text: vbolwetši bja madi a magolo ka mahlatse a se a fetelwa ke baerase ye – a ile a hlokomela bana ba rena ba babedi," gwa bolela mohammed.
tgt_text: vlonesifo sashukela kanye nehayihayi siyabonga kutsi yena akazange asuleleka ngaleligciwane – wanakekela lalabanye lababili bantfwana betfu," kusho yena njalo mohammed.

src_text: a fola ka pela kudu ge a se na go fenya maswao a gagwe," a realo.
tgt_text: ngekusho kwelitiko letemphilo lasenshonalanga kapa, bantfu labanesifo sehayihayi, sashukela kanye umdlavuta, emaphesenti lamabiliumndeni wamohammed bewusolo utilandzela tonkhe tinyatselo tetekuhlanteka emsebentini nasekhaya, kute bagweme kwesuleleka ngaleligciwane.

src_text: ba lapa la bo mohammed ba ile ba obamela ditshepedišo ka moka tša pabalelo ya maphelo ka mošomong le ka gae, go efoga gore ba se ke ba fetelwa ke baerase.
tgt_text: umndeni wami bewuvisisa, unakekela futsi usisekela, futsi bewusiletsela kudla kwakusihlwa onkhe malanga ntsambama, ngalesinye sikhatsi ummango ungakhombisa kunganakekeli kanye nekulimalalokubangwa tinkhundla tekuchumana kuyetfusa," kusho yena njalo mohammed.

src_text: "ba lapa la ka ba be ba kwešiša, ba kgathala ebile ba na le thekgo, gomme ba re tlišetša dijo tša mantšiboa bošegong bjo bongwe le bjo bongwe, eupša ka dinako tše dingwe setšhaba sa geno se ka no insaaf mohammed, yo a nago le asema, o kgonne go fenya covid19 ge e le gore o na le maswao afe goba afe a bolwetši, a go swana le go ﬁ ša ga mmele, go gohlola, goba go felelwa ke moya, ikgokaganye le mogala wa go se lefelwe wa covid19 mo go 0800 029 999 goba romela lentšu le ‘hi’ go 0600 123 456
tgt_text: make lonekugula laphila nako wehlula icovid19 silusapho nyanda insaaf mohammed utsi kubaluleke kakhulu kutsi bantfu baseningizimu afrika ikakhulu labo labaphila nekugula kutsi banakekele timphilo tabo.

src_text: re gopola bašomedi ba rena ba tlhokomelo ya maphelo vukuzenzele unnamed palo ya moragorago ya mahu a go hlolwa ke coronavirus e fetile 2 000. godimo go bao ba lobilego maphelo a bona ke bašomedi ba tša maphelo, ditsebi tša go hloka bosodi mešomong ya bona bao ba hlokometšego bao ba lwalago, ebile e be e le bona ba thekgago le go homotša bao ba lego maokelong ba beetšwe thoko le ba malapa a bona.
tgt_text: kubonga lokukhetsekile lokucondziswe kutisebenti tetfu tekunakekela ngetemphilo vukuzenzele unnamed linani lalabashone ngenca yeligciwane lecorona esikhatsini lesisandza kwendlula selengce sibalo se2 000. emkhatsini walabo labalahlekelwe timphilo tabo tisebenti tekunakekela ngetemphilo, tingcweti letiphelele lebetinakekela labagulako, futsi betitinsika futsi tidvudvuta labo labasesibhedlela labahlukanisiwe nemindeni yabo.

src_text: gore banna le basadi bao ba rwelego mošomo wo o bohlokwa wa go kgethega magetleng a bona ke bona bao ba fetelwago ke bolwetši bjo le go hlokagala ke taba ye hlobaetšago kudu.
tgt_text: indzaba yekutsi lamadvodza nabomake labenta lemisebenti lehloniphekile nalengcwele kwabona bayagula futsi bayashona kusishayo lesibuhlungu kakhulu.

src_text: ke bona batho ba matho mothomo ba go phenkgišana le leuba le.
tgt_text: ngibo labayibambe embi li lapho imphi yekulwa nalolubhubhane ishisa khona.

src_text: ba šoma ka tlase ga kgatelelo ye kgolo ebile ba swanela ke go dula ba tshwenyegile megopolong ka ge ba tseba gore ba kotsing ya go fetelwa ke baerase ye.
tgt_text: basebenta ngaphasi kwekucindzeteleka lokukhulu futsi kufanele kutsi batfwale kucindzeteleka ngekwengcondvo ngobe bati kutsi basebungotini bekutseleleka ngaleligciwane.

src_text: ke bagale le bagalegadi ba makgonthe ba phenkgišano ya rena kgahlanong le coronavi rus.
tgt_text: bangema chawekati nemachawe sibili emphi yetfu yekulwa naleligciwane lecorona.

src_text: re hlompha bagale ba ba maafrika borwa bao ba tlogelago magae a bona, malapa a bona le baratwa ba bona gore ba tle mešomong tšatši ka tšatši ntle le go šitwa ba eya dikliniking, maokelong le mafelong a mangwe a tša maphelo.
tgt_text: sibatfulela sigcoko labantfu baseningizimu afrika labanesibindzi labashiya emakhaya abo, imindeni kanye nalababatsandzako kutsi baye emsebentini ngaphandle kwekuphutsa onkhe malanga emitfolamphilo, etibhedlela kanye nakuletinye tikhungo tetemphilo.

src_text: gona fao ba fana ka tlhokomelo ya bongaka, thekgo ya tša tsamaišo le ditirelo tše dingwe go swana le go hlwekiša le go fepa batho ka dijo.
tgt_text: lapho bafike banike kunakekela kwetekwe lashwa, kwesekela ngetekuphatsa kanye naletinye tinsita letifanana nekuhlanta kanye nekuphakela ngekudla.

src_text: ge ba le gare ba phethagatša mešomo ya bona ya bokgoni, le rena bjalo ka setšhaba ke mošomo wa rena go ba šireletša le ba malapa a bona.
tgt_text: njengaloku nabo benta umsebenti wabo webungcweti, natsi kanjalo sinemsebenti lekumele kutsi siwente kubo kanye nasemindenini yabo.

src_text: maphelo le polokego ya bona a swanetše go tla pele.
tgt_text: imphilo yabo kanye nekuphepha kwabo kufanele kutsi kube ngulokusemcoka kakhulu.

src_text: re a ba hlompha le go ba thekga bjalo ka banna le basadi bao ba laeditšego gore ba itokišeditše go bea maphelo a bona kotsing gore re tle re kgone go phela.
tgt_text: siyabahlonipha futsi siyabatisa njengabobabe nabomake labakhombise kutsi ba timisele kubeka timphilo tabo ebungotini kute kutsi tsine siphile.

src_text: gore ba kgone go dira mešo mo ya bona ye boimaima ba hloka thekgo le tšhireletšo ya rena ka kabo ya didirišwa tša tšhireletšo ya mmele (dippe).
tgt_text: kute kutsi bente umsebenti wabo lomkhulu bayakudzinga kutsi sibasekele kanye nekutsi sibavikele ngekutsi sibanike tisetjentiswa tekutsi bativikele bona (ippe).

src_text: ka thekgo ya sekhwama sa naga le dineelano tša go tšwa go maafrika borwa a mantši o tee ka o tee, dikgwebong, dithe ong le mebušong ye mengwe, re ile ra kgona go rekela bašomi ba ba bogale dippe.
tgt_text: ngekwesekelwa sikhwama semfelandzawonye kanye neminikelo levela kulabo bantfu labanengi baseningi zimu afrika, emabhizinisi, tinhlangano kanye nalabanye bohulumende, sikhonile kutsi sitsenge tisetjentiswa tekuvikela letisebenti letinesibindzi letisebenta embili lapho kunebungoti khona.

src_text: fao go bilego le tlhaelelo ya dippe, maokelo a rena a hlaganela seemo seo ka ponyo ya leihlo go netefatša gore didirišwa tšeo di ba gona.
tgt_text: lapho kube nekuswelakala kwetisetjentiswa tekutivikela (emappe) tibhedlela tetfu tiya kulungisa ngekushesha loko kuci nisekisa kutsi tiyatfolakala.

src_text: re tseba gore khumanego ya dippe ga se yona tlhotlo e le noši yeo bašomedi ba tša maphelo ba lebaganego le yona.
tgt_text: siyati kutsi kukhona ku finyelela kutfola tisetjentiswa tekutivikela akusiyo kuphela insayeya tisebenti tetfu tekunakekela ngetemphilo letibukene nayo.

src_text: go ralala naga ka bophara, dikliniki le maokelo di lebagane le tlhaelelo ya bašomi.
tgt_text: kuyo yonkhe imitfolamphilo yalelive kanye netibhedlela tibukene nekuswelakala kwetisebenti.

src_text: bothata bjo bo gare bo a hlaganelwa.
tgt_text: lenkinga isasonjululwa.

src_text: go thekga mošomo wo bašo medi ba rena bao e lego ba mathomo ba go lwantšha bolwetši bjo ba o phethagatšago nageng ka bophara re romela ditona le batlatšatona seleteng se se nngwe le se se nngwe sa ka mo nageng go utolla ditlhotlo tša fao go ya ka fao batho ba itemogelago tšona dileteng tšeo le go šoma mmogo le makgotlataolo a profense a tša maphelo.
tgt_text: kwesekela lomsebenti lowentiwa tisebenti tetfuletisebenta ebungotini kulolonkhe lelive sitfumela tindvuna kanye nemasekela etindvuna kuleso naleso sigodzi kulelive titibonele tinkinga letitsite kuleto tigodzi kanye nekutsi tisebentisane netiphatsimandla tetemphilo tetifundza.

src_text: re swanetše go šoma mmogo go šireletša maphelo a bohle e sego fela a bašomedi ba tša maphelo eupša a bašomedi ka moka.
tgt_text: kudzingeka kutsi sisebente kanye kanye kute sigadze hhayi kuphela timphilo tetisebenti tetfu letisebenta ebungo tini kodvwa tonkhe tisebenti.

src_text: go šetše go bile le mošomo wa bothakga wo dirilwego ke diyunione go ruta maloko a tšona ka taolo ya go fetelwa ke bolwetši le thibelo gotee le tlhweko.
tgt_text: kunemsebenti lomuhle kakhulu losewentiwe tinyonyana ekufundziseni emalunga eveni lonkhe mayelana nekulawula kusuleleka kanye nekuvikeleka kanye nekuhlanteka.

src_text: tšona diyunione tše di thekga gape mošomo wa kgoro ya mešomo le ya bašomi go swara ditekolo tša mafelo a mešomo go netefatša gore ditshepedišo tša maphelo le tša polokego di a hlongwa go bašomedi bao ba boelago mešomong.
tgt_text: tiphindze futsi tisekele umsebenti welitiko letekucashwa nemisebenti ekubambeni imihlanganosikolwa yekuhlola kucinise kisa kutsi kunekugcinwa kwetinchubo tetemphilo nekuphepha letikhona taleto tisebenti letibuyako.

src_text: tše ntši tša diyunion e tša bašomi le tšona di fana ka tshedimošo ya coronavirus go maloko a tšona mola bengmešomo ba le gare ka masolo a temošo.
tgt_text: tinyonyana tetfu letinengi tiphindze futsi tinike lwatiso lweligciwane lecorona kumalunga ato kantsi nebacashi banemikhankhaso labayentako yekucaphelisa.

src_text: ye nngwe ya dihlotlo tšeo di hlagetšego naga ya gaborena ke ka fao batho bao go hlatsetšwego gore ba nale coronavirus ba tlontlollwago ka gona.
tgt_text: yinye yetinsayeya lebonakele kulelive letfu kubandlululwa kwalabo bantfu labatfolakale kutsi banaleligciwane lecoro na.

src_text: bjalo ka setšhaba, re nale maikarabelo a mohlakanelwa a go fediša go tlontlollwa ga batho bao ba fetetšwego ke coronavirus .
tgt_text: njengemmango, sinesibo pho sonkhe ngekuhlanganyela kutsi sikucedze nya lokubandlululwa kwebantfu labasuleleke ngaleligciwane lecoro na.

src_text: go bile le dipego tše hlobaetšago tša ka fao batho ka noši ba hlomarwago go tšwa fao ba tšwago le batho setšhabeng bao ba ipelaetšago kgahlanong le balwetši ba coronavirus ge ba amogelwa maokelong le dikiliniking tša kgauswi le bona.
tgt_text: kunemibiko letsikametako yebantfu labakhishwa umkhomboloti emimangweni yabo kanye nemimango leshucela tigulane letineligciwane lecorona letingeniswe etibhedlela tendzawo kanye nasemitfolamphilo.

src_text: se se swanetše go fela.
tgt_text: loko kufanele kutsi kuphele.

src_text: go swana le ka fao re bilego ngatana ye tee go hlohleletša go amogelwa ga batho bao ba nago le hiv le go ema ka lentšu le tee go lwantšha hlaolo ya bona, re swanetše go laetša kwešišo, kgotlelelo, boleta, kwelano le kwelobohloko go bao ba fetetšwego ke baerase ye le ba malapa a bona.
tgt_text: njengaloku sihlangana ekugcugcuteleni kwemukelwa kwalabo labaphila neligciwane lehiv futsi sime sicine simelane nekuhlukunyetwa, kufanele kutsi sikhombise kuvisisa, kwemukelana, umusa, kuvelana kanye nekucabangela labo labasuleleke ngaleligci wane kanye nemindeni yabo.

src_text: gothwe maitshwaro a a go tlontlollwa ga batho a hlohleletšwa ke poifo ya go fetelwa ke bolwetši le go hloka kwešišo.
tgt_text: kutsiwa kubandlululana kugcugcutelwa kwesaba kwesuleleka ngesifo kanye nekweswela kuvisisa.

src_text: tsela ye kaonekaone ya go fenya poifo ya rena ya tlhago ya bolwetši bjo le ya go fetelwa ke go latela ditshepedišo tša hlweko tšeo di lego gona.
tgt_text: indlela lencono kakhulu yekuncoma kwesaba kwetfu kugula kanye nekutsatselana kutsi sigcine tinchubo tekuhlanteka letibekiwe.

src_text: poifo ya go fetelwa ke bolwetši go hlatsetšwe gore e gona ebile ke ya makgonthe.
tgt_text: kwesaba kwesuleleka kunesizatfu lesivakalako futsi kuliciniso.

src_text: go le bjalo, re tseba seo re swanetšego go se dira go itšhireletša le go šireletša ba bangwe.
tgt_text: ngalokufananako, siyati kutsi yini lekumele kutsi siyente kute sitivikele futsi sivikele nalabanye.

src_text: re tseba gore baerasee ye e hlolwa ke eng le gore re ka dira eng go itšhireletša gore re se fetelwe.
tgt_text: siyati kutsi yini lokubange la leligciwane nekutsi yini lesingakwenta kute sitivikele kutsi singatseleleki.

src_text: re tseba gabotse gore re swanetše go šielana sekgala, go ipeela thoko le batho ba bangwe ge re kopane le bao ba fetetšwego le go ihlagiša maokelong ge re nale dika tša bolwetši bjo.
tgt_text: siyati kutsi kufanele kutsi sichelelane ngekwenhlalo, sihlale sodvwa nangabe kwenteke satsintsana nalabo labasulelekile kanye nekutsi siye esibhedlela nangabe sinetimphawu letikhomba kwesuleleka.

src_text: re swanetše go tšwelapele go hlahlwa ke dintlha tša mannete e sego mabarebare.
tgt_text: kufanele kutsi sichubeke siholwe ngemaciniso hhayi emahemuhemu.

src_text: nako yela ya gore mang le mang a bolele gore yena ga a tsebe motho yo a fetetšwego goba a amilwego ke coronavirus e fetile kgale.
tgt_text: sikhatsi sekutsi utsi ababati umuntfu losulelekile nome lotsintsekile ngaleligciwane lecorona sesendlule kudzala.

src_text: ka nako ye, go feta mehla yohle, bagwera ba rena, ba malapa, bašomimmogo le baagišane ba hloka kwelobohloko le thekgo ya rena.
tgt_text: nyalo, kakhulu kunakucala, bangani betfu, imindeni yetfu, lesisebenta nabo kanye nabomakhelwane badzinga luvelo lwetfu kwanye nekubasekela.

src_text: mo matšatšing, dibekeng le dikgwedi tše tlago, re tla fela re ikhwetša re hloka tshepho le go boifa ge re bona palo ya bao ba fetetšwego le bao ba hlokagalago e hlatloga.
tgt_text: kulamalanga, emaviki kanye netinyanga letitako, ngaletinye tikhatsi sitawukutikhandza sesiphelelwe litsemba futsi sesesaba nasibona emanani ebantfu labasulelekile kanye nalabo labashonako achubeka ngekwenyuka.

src_text: go ka direga gore seemo se gakale, eupša re nale bonnete bja gore go tla kaonafala.
tgt_text: kungenteka kutsi tintfo tibe timbi kakhulu, kodvwa sinesiciniseko sekutsi sitawubancono.

src_text: boramahlale ba rena le baeletši ba dingaka ba re boditše gore kelo ya diphetelo e tla hlatloga ge re batamela nhlorwaneng ya rena ya diphetelo.
tgt_text: bososayensi betfu kanye nebaluleki betekwelapha baseluleka ngekutsi lizinga lekusuleleka litakwenyuka njengaloku sisondzela esicongweni setfu.

src_text: eupša nnete ke gore palo ye e tla theogela fase.
tgt_text: kodvwa nakanjani litawuphindza futsi lehle.

src_text: re gopola bašomedi ba rena ba tša maphelo bao ba lobilego maphelo a bona ba hlokometše balwetši.
tgt_text: sibonga leto tisebenti letinakekela ngetemphilo letilahlekelwe timphilo tato ngekunakekela labagulako.

src_text: ge re gopola mediro ya bona, a re netefatšeng gore rena le badudi ba gaborena re bolokegile ka go kgatha tema ya rena.
tgt_text: ekubakhumbuleni kwetfu, asitigcine siphephile kanye netakhamuti takitsi ngekutsi sidlale indzima yetfu.

src_text: re tla fenya baerase ye le go aga setšhaba ka leswa.
tgt_text: sitalincoba leligciwane futsi siphindze sisakhe futsi sive sakitsi.

src_text: re fetile mehleng ye boima ebile re fentše go yona.
tgt_text: sesike sahlangabetana netikhatsi letimatima kodvwa satincoba.

src_text: a re tieng maatla le hlohleletšo ge re le gare re šoma mmogo go phološa maphelo.
tgt_text: kubonga lokukhetsekile lokucondziswe kutisebenti tetfu tekunakekela ngetemphilo vukuzenzele unnamed linani lalabashone ngenca yeligciwane lecorona esikhatsini lesisandza kwendlula selengce sibalo se2 000. emkhatsini walabo labalahlekelwe timphilo tabo tisebenti tekunakekela ngetemphilo, tingcweti letiphelele lebetinakekela labagulako, futsi betitinsika futsi tidvudvuta labo labasesibhedlela labahlukanisiwe nemindeni yabo.

src_text: molemi wa moswa o amogela thekgo ya covid19 silusapho nyanda molemi yo a sa thomago tša temo wa kua kapa bohlabela ke yo mongwe wa bao ba holegilego go tšwa sekhwameng sa mmušo sa kimollo ya coronavirus.
tgt_text: umlimi lomncane utfola lusito lwecovid19 silusapho nyanda umlimi losafufusa wasempumalanga kapa ungulomunye walabazuzile esikhwameni selusito lweligciwane lecorona sahulumende.

src_text: nomagcinandile suduka wa mengwaga ye 27 o aga bohwa bja lapa la gabo le lehumo ka go beeletša temong.
tgt_text: nomagcinandile suduka (27) ukhu lisa ligama nemno tfo wemndeni wakubo ngekusisa kutekulima.

src_text: mong wa kgwebo ya 4 u and 4 me primary cooperative kua motsaneng wa mooiplaas o amogetše thušo go tšwa sekhwameng sa kimollo sa coronavirus (covid19) sa kgoro ya temo, mpshafatšo ya naga le tlhabollo ya dinagamagae ka baka la polasa ya gagwe, ya mae gagwe, diruiwa le merogo.
tgt_text: umnikati we4 u and 4 me primary cooperative esigodzini sasemooip laas watfola kwesekelwa lokuvela kusikhwama selusito lweligciwane lecorona (covid19) selitiko letekulima, lekubuyiselwa kwemhlaba nelekutfutfukisa tindzawo tasemakhaya selipulazi lakhe lemacandza, lemfuyo nelemifino.

src_text: kgoro e fane ka dibaotšhara tša go bitša r1.2 bilione go balemi bao ba di hlokago.
tgt_text: litiko likhiphe emavawu sha lalingana r1.2 emabhili yoni kubalimi labanesidzingo.

src_text: suduka o bolela gore di baotšhara di tla mo thuša go godiša lehlakore la kgwebo ya gagwe la go tšweletša mae.
tgt_text: suduka utsi ivawusha yakhe itamsita kutsi akhulise incenye yelibhizinisi lakhe lekukhicita emacandza.

src_text: "ke amogetše dibaotšhara tše tharo tša go bitša r19 000. tšona ke baotšhara ya r12 000 go reka dikgogo tša go bea mae tse 100, baotšhara ya r6 500 ya go reka dijo tša dikgogo le baotšhara ya r500 ya go reka meryana.
tgt_text: "ngatfola emavawusha lamatsatfu elinani selilonkhe lelir19 000. ivawusha yelinani lelir12 000 yekutsenga tinkhukhu letitalela emacandza leti100, ivawusha yelinani lelir6 500 ye kutsenga kudla nevawusha yer500 yekutsenga imitsi.

src_text: "o thomile polasa ya gagwe ya go tšweletša dikgogo ka go fepa dikgogo tša gae tša lapa la gabo ka dijo tša go di thwathwadiša mae, tšeo di di kgontšhago gore di thwathwatše mae ntle le gore di namelane.
tgt_text: "wacala lelipulazi lakhe lekukhicita emacandza ngekunika tinkhukhu takubo tendzabuko kudla lokukhulisa kutalela emacandza, lo kutenta tikhicite emacandza ngaphandle kwekuhlangana nelichudze.

src_text: dikgogo tša gagwe gabjale di tšweletša mae a 50 ka letšatši, gomme yena o wa rekiša beke ka beke.
tgt_text: tinkhukhu takhe leti50 nyalo tikhicita emacandza la50 ngelilanga, lawatsengisa njalo ngeliviki.

src_text: suduka, yo le yena a tsenetšego tša temo ka dipudi tše 73, dinku tše 25 le dikgomo tše 25 o thomile tša temo ka 2015 morago ga go ikhweletša sethifikeithi sa n6 sa taolo ya mmušo go tšwa kholetšeng ya ikhala ya thutatiro le ya tlhahlo.
tgt_text: suduka, lobuye abe ngu mlimi wetimbuti leti73, timvu leti25 netinkhomo leti25, wacala kuba ngumlimi ngemnyaka we2015 emva kwekutfola sitifiketi sen6 sepublic management lasitfola eikhala training and vocational education and training college.

src_text: morago ga go lemoga gore mešomo ga e kaalo, a tšea sephetho sa go tšea polasa yeo ka nako yeo e bego e dirišwa ke lapa la gabo go iphediša a e fetošetša go ba kgwebo ya go dira letseno.
tgt_text: emva kwekubona kutsi kute ematfuba ekutfola umsebenti, watsatsa sincumo sekutsatsa lipulazi lakubo lebelilima kancane waligucula labalibhizinisi lelinenzuzo.

src_text: suduka ge a bolela o re: "re gotše re dira tša temo, ke moka morago ga go aloga ke tšeere sephetho sa go tsenela temo legatong la go inyakela mošomo."
tgt_text: suduka utsi: "sikhule senta umsebenti webulimi, ngakoke emva kwekutfola ticu ngitsetse sincumo sekuba ngumlimi kunekutsi ngibuke umsebenti.

src_text: se se ile sa hlatsela go ba sephetho sa hlohleletšo, kudu ka ge a godišitše dipudi le dikgomo tša palo ya go bonagala.
tgt_text: "loku kube sincumo lesikhutsatako, njengoba bekasakhulise timbuti netinkhomo letinengi.

src_text: polasa ya suduka ya di hektara tše tshela ka bogolo e tšweletša mafela, matapola, dierekise le dinawa.
tgt_text: sivandze sasaduka lesi mahektha lasitfupha sikhicita ummbila, emazambane, emaphizi nemabhontjisi.

src_text: mafela a bjalwa dihektareng tše nne, matapola a bjalwa hektareng ye tee mola dierekisi le dinawa di bjalwa mo hektareng ya mafelelo.
tgt_text: ummbila uhlanyelwe kumahektha lamane, emazambane kuhektha yinye kwatsi emaphizi nemabhontjisi abelana ngehektha yekugcina.

src_text: suduka o ithutile tše ntši go tšwa go covid19 , kuduku du ka gore thoto ye kaoneka one ke matsogo a gagwe le go šoma ga gagwe ka thata.
tgt_text: suduka ufundze lokunyenti kucovid19 , kakhulu kutsi lokubaluleke kakhulu ngiletandla takhe nekusebenta kwakhe ngekutikhandla.

src_text: nomagcinandile suduka o fetošeditše polasa ya lapa la gabo ya go iphediša go ba kgwebo ye nnyane.
tgt_text: umlimi lomncane utfola lusito lwecovid19 silusapho nyanda umlimi losafufusa wasempumalanga kapa ungulomunye walabazuzile esikhwameni selusito lweligciwane lecorona sahulumende.

src_text: afrika borwa e tšea kgato ya go rarolla bothata bja tlhokego ya dithušagohema silusapho nyanda sethušagohema seo se dirilwego ka mo afrika borwa se tla thuša balwetši bao ba nago le dika tša magareng tša covid19 gore ba heme gabonolo.
tgt_text: iningizimu afrika itsatsa sinyatselo sekulungisa kuswelakala kwetisitakuphefumula silusapho nyanda sisitakuphefumula lesakhiwe kulelive sitawusita tigulane letinetimphawu letingasimatima kakhulu tecovid19 kutsi tiphefumule lula.

src_text: ntwa kgahlanong le bolwetši bja coronavirus (covid19) ka afrika borwa e matlafaditšwe ke sethušagohema sa mathomo seo se dirilwego ka mo nageng.
tgt_text: kulwa nesifo seligciwane lecorona (icovid19) lapha eningizimu afrika kufakwe umfutfo sisitakuphefumula sekucala lesentiwe lapha kulelive lakitsi.

src_text: sethušagohema sa continuous positive airway pressure (cpap) se thuša balwetši bao ba nago le dika tša magareng tša covid19 gore ba kgone go hema gabonolo ka go ba fa moya wa oksetšene gore o dire gore meelamoya ya bona e dule e bulegile.
tgt_text: lesisitakuphefumula lesatiwa ngekutsi pheceleti continuous positive airway pressure (icpap) sisita tigulane letinetimphawu letingasimatima kakhulu tecovid19 kutsi tiphefumule lula ngekutsi sitinike umoyamphilo losezingeni lelilingene lesicindzetelo semoya kute kugcineke emaphayiphi lahambisa umoya avulekile.

src_text: sethušagohema se hlamilwe ke ba council for scientific and industrial research (csir) ka tšhomišano le e tšwelapele letlakaleng la 2o boloke afrika borwammogo re ka fenya coronaviruso bolokeg batšeakarolo ba se bakae ba mo gae, gomme e tla abelwa balwetši go phatlalala le naga bao ba nago le mathata a go hema mo legatong la mathomo la phetelo ya covid19.
tgt_text: lesisitakuphefumula sadizayinwa ngumkhandlu wetesayensi netelucwaningo lwetetimboni (icsir) ngekuhlanganyela nebalingani bakuleli labanengi futsi sisatjalaliswa eveni lonkhe sisetjentiswe tigulane letikhombisa kuba nenkinga ekuphefumuleni esigabeni sekucala sekuhabula icovid19.

src_text: "moya woo motho ao hemago o na le dipersente tše 23 tša oksetšene.
tgt_text: "umoya lotayelekile umuntfu lawuphefumulako unemoyamphilo lowetiye ngemaphesenti lange23.

src_text: sethušagohema sa cpap se kgona go pompa oksetšene e ntšhi, gomme ya thuša motho go hema.
tgt_text: impampi yesisitakuphefumula yecpap ingampompa linani lelisetulu lemoyamphilo, kusita umuntfu kutsi aphefumule.

src_text: cpap e pompa oksetšene e sa emiše.
tgt_text: icpap impompa ngalokuchubekako umoyamphilo lotiyile.

src_text: o ka oketša goba wa fokotša bontšhi bja oksetšene yeo motho a e hemago," gwa realo molaodiphethiši wa csir future production: manufacturing, elego martin sanne.
tgt_text: ungakhona kutsi wandzise nome unciphise linani lemoyamphilo umuntfu lawuphefumulako," kusho umlawuli lomkhulu wecsir future production: manufacturing martin sanne.

src_text: balwetši bao ba šomišago sethušagohema ba se lokelwa maskeng woo ba tla bego ba o apere oksetšene e gogwa go tšwa tankeng ya kgase gomme ya hlakantšhwa le moya wa tlhago ka gare ga sethušagohema, gomme go tloga moo o romelwa maskeng gomme wa hemelwa ka gare ke molwetši.
tgt_text: tigulane letisebentisa lesisitakuphefumula tichunyaniswa ngekusebentisa sifonyo.

src_text: sanne o bolela gore godimo ga go pompa moya wa go ba le oksetšene, cpap e thuša gape balwetši gore ba hemele ka ntle.
tgt_text: umoyamphilo udvonswa ethangeni lelinegesi yemoyamphilo iphindze futsi ibhicaniswe nemoya wemvelo kulesisitakuphefumula, kusuka lapha bese wendluliselwa kulesifonyo bese sigulane siyayihogela.

src_text: sedirišwa sa cpap se ka šomišwa mafelong a tša maphelo a theknolotši ya godimo gape le ka mafelong a nakwana a bjalo ka maokelo a nakwana le mafelo a boipeelothoko.
tgt_text: sanne utsi ekwengeteni ekumpompeni umoyamphilo, lecpap iphindze futsi isite tigulane kutsi tiphefumule tikhiphe umoya.

src_text: sanne a re csir e tla be e kgonne go dira dithušagohema tše 10 000 ge kgwedi ya phato e fihla mafelelong.
tgt_text: lesisetjentiswa secpap singasetjentiswa kutimondzawo tetekwelapha tebuchwepheshe lobusezingeni lelisetulu nome kutimondzawo tesikhashana, njengasetibhedlela tesikhashana kanye nasetindzaweni tekuhlala wedvwa ngenca yesifo.

src_text: ka tšhomišano le siemens, simera, akacia, gabler, umoya le yunibesithi ya cape town, csir e tšweleditše cpap go ya le ka melawana ya mokgatlo wa lefase wa tša maphelo.
tgt_text: sanne utsi icsir itawube seyikhicite tisitakuphefumula leti10 000 ekupheleni kwenyanga yengci.

src_text: dithušagohema tša mathomo di tla fiwa maokelo a mmušo ao a lego bothateng bja tlhokego ya didirišwa tša go lwantšhana le covid19.
tgt_text: ngekusebentisana nebakasiemens, simera, akacia, gabler, umoya kanye nenyuvesi yasekapa, icsir ikhicite lecpap ngekulandzela tilinganisozinga tenhlangano yemhlaba yetemphilo.

src_text: csir e thomile go šomana le cpap morago ga gore lefase le itemogele tlhokego ye kgolo ya dithušagohema.
tgt_text: tisitakuphefumula tekucala titawunikwa tibhedlela tahulumende leticindzetelekile ngenca yekungabikhona kwetisetjentiswa tekubukana necovid19.

src_text: "dikgweding tša hlakola le moranang go bile le tlhokego ya dithušagohema go tšwa go baabi ba tšona ba boditšhabatšhaba.
tgt_text: icsir yacala kwakha lecpap ngemuva kwekutsi umhlaba ucale kubukana nekuswelakala lokukhulu kwetisitakuphefumula.

src_text: moo di bego di hwetšagala gona di be di bitša kudu, gomme ke moo mmušo o ntšhitšego thentara ya go dira dithušagohema," gwa realo sanne.
tgt_text: "kusukela ngendlovulenkhulu kanye namabasa, kwaba nekuswelakala ngekushesha kwekuphakelwa ngetisitakuphefumula kubatfulitinsita betfu bemave emhlaba.

src_text: thentara yeo e be e le karolo ya protšeke ya bosetšhaba ya dithušagohema ya ka lefapheng la tša kgwebo, intaseteri le phadišano.
tgt_text: lapho betitfolakala khona, besetibita kakhulu ngaleso sizatfuke, hulumende wakhipha ithenda kutsi kukhicitwe letisitakuphefumula," kusho yena njalo sanne.

src_text: csir e gare e šoma gape ka sethušagohema sa bilevel positive airway pressure seo nepo ya sona elego go thuša balwetši bao ba nago le dika tše šoro tša covid19sethušagohema seo se tla thuša ka go hemela ka gare le ka ntle, e ka ba ka mokgwa wa go gatelela moya goba ka go lekola kabo ya oksetšene yeo molwetši a e hlokago, gape le go beakanya kgatelelo ya moya go ya le ka moo e hlokegago.
tgt_text: iningizimu afrika itsatsa sinyatselo sekulungisa kuswelakala kwetisitakuphefumula silusapho nyanda sisitakuphefumula lesakhiwe kulelive sitawusita tigulane letinetimphawu letingasimatima kakhulu tecovid19 kutsi tiphefumule lula.

src_text: thuša go emiša go phatlalala ga covid19 vukuzenzele unnamed setšhaba sa gaborena se lebagane le bothata bjo bogolo historing ya temokrasi ya rena.
tgt_text: sita kutsi sivimbe kubhebhetseka kwecovid19 vukuzenzele unnamed sive sakitsi sibukene nenkinga lenkhulukati emlandvweni wetfu wentsandvo yelinyenti.

src_text: mo matšatšing a go feta a 120, re atlegile go diteleng go phatlalala ga baerase yeo e hlolago masetlapelo lefaseng ka bophara.
tgt_text: ngetulu kwetinsuku leti120, siphumelele kubambelela kubhebhetseka kweligciwane lelibanga umonakalo lomkhulukati emhlabeni wonkhana.

src_text: efela gabjale go keka ga diphetetšo, fao re kilego ra eletšwa ke ditsebi tša bongaka gore go tlo ba gona, go fihlile.
tgt_text: kodvwa nyalo, kwandza kakhulu kwekusuleleka leselulekwe ngako tati tetekwelapha kutsi kuyeta, sekufikile.

src_text: palo ya go feta kotara ya milione ya maafrika borwa e fetetšwe ke coronavirus, gomme ebile re a tseba gore diphetetšo tše dintšhi di iphihlile.
tgt_text: bangetulu kwekota yesigidzi bantfu baseningizimu afrika lasebasuleleke ngaleligciwane lecorona, siyati futsi kutsi kwesuleleka lokunyenti kusengakabonwa.

src_text: gabjale go netefatšwa diphetetšo tše diswa tša go feta 12 000 tšatši le lengwe le le lengwe.
tgt_text: nyalo sesitfola tehlakalo tekwesuleleka letinsha letingetulu kwe12,000 malanga onkhe.

src_text: esale go tloga mola bolwetši bjo bo phulegago ka kgwedi ya hlakola, go hlokofetše batho ba 4 079 ba bolawa ke covid19.
tgt_text: kusukela kwacala lokubhedvuka ngenyanga yendlovulenkhulu, lokungenani sekushone bantfu laba4, 079 ngenca yalecovid19.

src_text: bjalo ka maphoto a magolo a go tonya ao a budulelago ka nageng ya rena go tšwa ka lewatleng la south atlantic mo nakong ye ya ngwaga, go na le dikarolo di se kae tša ka mo nageng tšeo di ka se fihlelelwego ke coronavirus.
tgt_text: njengaloku kunemakhata lashubisa umnkantja lahlasele lelive lakitsi lachamuka eningizimu yeatlantic ngalesikhatsi semnyaka, timbalwa tincenye talelive letingeke titsintfwe nguleligciwane lecorona.

src_text: coronaviruse kotsi le go ba šoro kudu go feta efe goba efe yeo e kilego ya ba gona.
tgt_text: lesivunguvungu saleligciwane lecorona sinelulaka lolukhulu futsi sibhubhisa kakhulu kwengca nome ngabe yini lesikwatiko kwaphambilini.

src_text: e tloga e tlaralatša mošomo wa didirišwa tša rena le maikemišetšo ka go fetišiša.
tgt_text: imitfombolusito yetfu isebenta ngalokwecile futsi seyisondzele emikhawulweni yayo.

src_text: go keka ga diphetetšo, elego seo se akantšwego ke ditsebi le boramahlale ba borena kgweding tše tharo tšeo di fetilego, go fihlile.
tgt_text: lokwandza kwekwesuleleka tingcweti tetfu tetekwelapha kanye nabososayensi labakubiketele etinyangeni letintsatfu letengcile nyalo sekufikile.

src_text: go thomile ka kapa bodikela gomme gabjale go tsene ka kapa bohlabela le ka gauteng.
tgt_text: kucale enshonalanga kapa kantsi futsi sekusendleleni kuya emphumalanga kapa nasegauteng.

src_text: le ge go le bjalo, ge diphetetšo di golela godimo ka lebelo, go bohlokwa go lemoga gore palo ya mahu ya dipersente tše 1.5 ke ye nngwe ya dipalo tša fasefase lefaseng ge e bapetšwa le ya lefase ya dipersente tše 4.4. go ba fasefase ga palo ya mahu ka nageng ya gaborena go hlotšwe ke maitemogelo le boikgafo bja bašomedi ba tša maphelo gape le magato a tšhoganetšo ao re a tšeerego go hlabolla mokgwa wa tša maphelo.
tgt_text: nanome kunjalo, ngesikhatsi kusuleleka kwandza kakhulu, kubalulekile kucaphela kutsi lizinga lemaphesenti la1.5 alabo labashonako lisemkhatsini walaphasi kakhulu emhlabeni.

src_text: le ge bontšhi bja batho ba gaborena ba tšeere magato a go thibela phatlalalo ya baerase, go na le bao ba sego ba dira bjalo.
tgt_text: loku kucatsaniswa neavareji yemhlaba wonkhe yemaphesenti la4.4 elizinga lalabashonako.

src_text: go na le ba bangwe bao ba hlokomologago melawana yeo e fetišitšwego ya go lwantšhana le bolwetši bjo.
tgt_text: lelinani lelincane lalabashonako kulelive kungenca yesipiliyoni kanye nekutinikela kwetingcweti tetfu tetemphilo kanye netinyatselo letiphutfumako lesititsetse sakha emandla ekwenta umsebenti eluhlelweni lwetfu lwetemphilo.

src_text: mo kgabagareng ya leuba le, go tsena ka gare ga thekisi o se wa apara maske, go kopana le bagwera, go ya meletlong goba gona go etela meloko, go ka phatlalatša baerase gabonolo gomme gwa ba le go lobja ga maphelo.
tgt_text: njengaloku linyenti lebantfu bakitsi batsatse sinyatselo sekuvikela kubhebhetseka kwaleligciwane, kodvwa kukhona labanye labangakwenti loko.

src_text: bjo e ka no ba e le bolwetši bjoo bo hlolwago ke baerase, efela bo phatlalatšwa ke mekgwa le maitshwaro a batho.
tgt_text: kukhona labanye emkhatsini wetfu labangayishayi mkhuba lemitsetfomgomo leshayiwe yekulwa nalesifo.

src_text: ka maitshwaro a rena – re le batho, malapa le ditšhaba – re ka kgona ebile re swanetše re fetole mokgwaphatlalalo wa leuba le ka mo nageng.
tgt_text: kusekhona lolubhubhane, kugibela eteksini ungakafaki sifonyo, kuhlangana nebangani, kuhambela imicimbi yemadzili nome ngisho nekuvakashela umndeni, kungabhebhetsekisa leligciwane kalula futsi kube khona labalahlekelwa timphilo tabo.

src_text: re swanetše re apare maske wa lešela woo o khupetšago nko le molomo nako ye nngwe le ye nngwe ge re e tšwa ka gae.
tgt_text: lesi kungaba sifo lesibangwa ligciwane kodvwa libhebhetsekiswa kutiphatsa kwemuntfu.

src_text: re swanetše re tšwele pele go hlapa diatla ka meetse le sesepe goba sebolayaditwatši ka mehla.
tgt_text: ngenca yetento tetfu – talowo nalowo, temindeni, temimango, – singakhona futsi kufanele kutsi siyigucule indlela yalolubhubhane kulelive lakitsi.

src_text: re swanetše re tšwele pele go hlwekiša le go bolaya ditwatši mabatong ka moka a mafelo a bohle.
tgt_text: kudzingeka kutsi sifake sifonyo sendvwangu lesivala imphumulo nemlomo nangabe siphuma ekhaya.

src_text: sa bohlokwa le go feta ke gore re swanetše re bule sekgoba sa dimitara tše pedi gare ga rena le batho ba bangwe.
tgt_text: kufanele kutsi sichubeke sigeze njalo tandla tetfu ngensipho nemanti nome ngesibulalimagciwane.

src_text: gabjale go na le bohlatse bjoo bo tšwelelago bja gore baerase ye e ka kgona le go fofa moyeng mo mafelong ao a tletšego batho ba bantšhi, ao a tswalegilego goba ao ka go ona moya o sa sepelego botse.
tgt_text: kufanele kutsi sichubeke sigeze futsi sihlante ngesibulalimagciwane lonkhe lingetulu letindzawo lapho kutfolakala khona bantfu.

src_text: ka lona lebaka le, re swanetše re hlabolle mafelo a setšhaba ao a tswalegilego ka pelapela, elego fao kotsi ya go fetelwa e lego godimo kudu.
tgt_text: lokubaluleke kakhulu, kufanele kutsi sishiye libanga lekukhweshelana leliphephile – lokungenani lemamitha lamabili – kulomunye umuntfu.

src_text: sephetho sa rena sa go tla ka kiletšo ya mosepelo ya bosetšhaba se thibetše phatlalalo ya diphetetšo mathomong ge ditirelo tša maphelo di be di se tša itokiša, elego seo se ka bego se hlotše tobo ye kgolo ya maphelo.
tgt_text: nyalo sekunebufakazi lobusha lobuvelako bekutsi leligciwane lingahlala emoyeni etindzaweni lapho kunesicuku sebantfu, letivalekile nome letingangenisi kahle umoya.

src_text: ka nako yeo re bilego le yona, re tšeere magato a bohlokwa go matlafatša mekgwa ya go ikarabela ya tša maphelo.
tgt_text: ngaleso sizatfuke kufanele kutsi sitente ncono timondzawo letingekhatsi tetindzawo temmango lapho bungoti bekusuleleka ngalesifo bubukhulu kakhulu.

src_text: re šetše re dirile diteko tša coronavirus tša go feta dimilione tše pedi, gomme bašomedi ba tša maphelo ba šetše ba dirile diponego tša go feta dimilione tše 20. re dirile gore go be le mepete e 28 000 ya balwetši ba covid19 ka maokelong, gomme ebile re agile maokelo a nakwana go kgabaganya naga.
tgt_text: sincumo setfu sekumemetela kumiswansi kwemisebenti, iminyakato nekuhlala ekhaya kwavelonkhe kwavimbela kusuleleka lokukhulu ekucaleni ngesikhatsi tinsita tetfu tetemphilo betisengakalungeli kahle, lokuyintfo lengabe yaholela ekulahlekelweni kakhulu timphilo tebantfu.

src_text: gabjale re na le mepete e 37 000 ya boipeelothoko mafelong a poraebete le a setšhaba go kgabaganya naga, gomme a itokišeditše go amogela bao ba sa kgonego go ipeela thoko ka magae.
tgt_text: kulesikhatsi lesibe naso, sitsatse tinyatselo letimcoka tekucinisa kuphendvula kwetfu ngekwetemphilo.

src_text: re rekile le go aba dimilione tša didirišwa tša go itšhireletša maokelong, dikliniking le dikolong go kgabaganya naga, e lego tša go šireletša bašomedi bao ba šomago ka batho ba bantšhi.
tgt_text: sesente luhlolo lweligciwane lecorona lolungetulu kwetigidzi letimbili kantsi tisebenti temmango tetemphilo setente luhlolokuhlunga lolungetulu kwetigidzi letinge20.

src_text: re thwetše ebile re sa thwala baoki, dingaka le bašomedi ba tša tšhoganetšo ba tlaleletšo.
tgt_text: sesente kutsi kube nemibhedze yasesibhedlela yelinani lelifinyelela ku28,000 yetigulane tecovid19 futsi sesakhe netibhedlela tesikhashana letisebentako eveni lonkhe.

src_text: re tšwela pele go ba le tšwelopele mo maitekelong a rena a go lwantšha covid19, efela tlhotlo ye kgolo e sa etla.
tgt_text: nyalo sesinemibhedze yekuhlala wedvwa ngenca yesifo lengetulu kwe37,000 kutisetjentiswa letitimele kanye nakutisetjentiswa tahulumende eveni lonkhe, letilungele kwehlukanisa ngayedvwa labo labangakhoni kukwenta nabasemakhaya.

src_text: re šoma go kgabaganya diprofense go oketša palo ya mepete ya ka diwateng le ka tlhokomelong yeo e tseneletšego re direla balwetši ba covid19.
tgt_text: sesitsenge saphindza futsi saletsa tisetjentiswa tekutivikela etibhedlela, emitfolamphilo kanye nasetikolweni kulolonkhe lelive kute kutsi sivikele tisebenti tetfu tetemphilo letisembili lapho imphi ishisa khona.

src_text: sekgoba se a bulwa ka maokelong a mmalwa ka go se amogele balwetši bao ba sa hlokego thušo ya tšhoganetšo.
tgt_text: siphindze futsi satweba futsi siyachubeka nekutweba bahlengi/bahlengikati labangetiwe, bodokotela kanye netisebenti tetemphilo tesimo lesiphutfumako.

src_text: go fetolwa gape le mafelo a mangwe ka maokelong go ba diwate tša tlaleletšo, gape le go agwa goba go oketšwa ga maokelo a nakwana.
tgt_text: siyachubeka nekwenta inchubekelembili emitameni yetfu yekubukana nalecovid19, kodvwa insayeya yetfu lenkhulu iseta.

src_text: re šoma go oketša kabo ya oksetšene, dithušagohema le didirišwa tše dingwe bakeng sa bao ba tlo hlokago tlhokomelo yeo e tseneletšego, go balwa le kabo ya oksetšene bakeng sa mabaka a mangwe.
tgt_text: kuto tonkhe tifundza, sisebenta ngemandla kutsi sandzise linani lemawadijikelele kanye nemibhedze yesimo lesibucayi yetigulane te covid19 kutsi ibekhona.

src_text: re diriša ditheknolotši tša titšithale go matlafatša taetšo, go nyakana gape le go beela thoko balwetši, le go thekga bao diteko tša bona di laetšago ba fetetšwe.
tgt_text: umtsamo wemawadi uyandziswa etibhedlela letinengi ngekutsi kubanjelelwe kunakekelwa kwetimo letingaphutfumi, kuguculwa kwaletinye tindzawo etibhedlela kutsi tibe ngemawadi langetiwe kanye nekwakhiwa nekukhuliswa kwetibhedlela tesikhashana.

src_text: bjale ka ge re lebile sehloeng sa diphetetšo, re hloka go ba le tlhokomelo ye kgolo le go thatafatša magato ao a latelwago gabjale go fokotša lebelo la diphetetšo.
tgt_text: siyasebenta kute kutsi sandzise kuphakelwa kwemoyamphilo, tisitakuphefumula kanye naletinye tisetjentiswa kulabo labatawudzinga kunakekelwa lokubucayi, lokufaka ekhatsi kujikiswa kuphakelwa kwemoyamphilo kuletinye tinhloso.

src_text: melawana ya mabapi le go apara dimaske e tla thatafatšwa.
tgt_text: sisabalalisa tebuchwepheshe bedijithali kute sicinise kubona, kulandzelela kanye nekwehlukanisa kutsi bahlale bodvwa labo labatsintsene nalabesulelekile, kanye nekwesekela labo labahlolwe bakhatfolakala kutsi banaleligciwane.

src_text: bengmešomo, bengmabenkele le balaodi, baotledi ba dinamelwa tša bohle, gape le balaodi le beng ba meago efe goba efe ya setšhaba, gabjale ba tlamegile semolao go netefatša gore yo mongwe le yo mongwe yoo a tsenago ka moagong goba ka senamelweng sa bona o swanetše go ba a apere maske.
tgt_text: njengaloku nyalo sesifinyelela ngasezingeni lelisetulu lekusuleleka, sidzinga kutsi sicaphele kakhulu futsi sicinise letinyatselo letikhona kute sehlise lizinga lekundluliseleka kwalesifo.

src_text: dithekisi tšeo di tšeago maeto a kgauswi di a dumelelwa go rwala go fihlela dipersenteng tše lekgolo, mola tša maeto a matelele di se tša dumelelwa go feta dipersente tše masomešupa, gomme gona fao go latelwe melawana e meswa ya mabapi le dimaske, go bolaya ditwatši ka dinamelweng gape le go bula mafasetere.
tgt_text: imitsetfomgomo yekufaka tifonyo itawuciniswa.

src_text: gabjale go na le bohlatse bjoo bo tletšego bja gore thekišo ya dinotagi e hlotše kgatelelo ye kgolo go maokelo, go akaretšwa le ka diyuniting tša maemo a tšhoganetšo le tša tlhokomelo yabao ba bakwago le badimo ka baka la dikotsi tša difatanaga, dikgaruru le mathata a go sepelelana le tšona.
tgt_text: tisebenti, banikati betitolo kanye nebaphatsi, labasebentisa tekutfutsa ummango, kanye nebalawuli kanye nebanikati banome ngabe ngusiphi sakhiwo semmango nyalo sebacindzetelwa ngumtsetfo kutsi bacinisekise kutsi nome ngabe ngubani longena emabaleni ato nome logibela sigitjelwa kufanele kutsi afake sifonyo.

src_text: ka fao, re tšeere sephetho sa gore, go re re kgone go lota sekgoba seo se šetšego se le gona ka maokelong, gona thekišo, kabo le phatlalatšo ya dinotagi e tla fegwa go tloga gonabjalebjale.
tgt_text: ematekisi lahamba luhambo lwendzawo avumelekile kutsi alayishe umtsamo wemaphesenti la100 kantsi lawo lahamba emabanga lamadze ngeke avunyelwe kutsi engce umtsamo wemaphesenti lange70, ngaphasi kwesimo sekutsi sendlelanchubo yekunciphisa bungoti lobusha lobuphatselene netifonyo, kufutsa sigitjelwa ngesibulalimagciwane kanye nekuvulwa kwemafasitelo tiyalandzelwa.

src_text: bjalo ka legato la tlaleletšo la go fokotša tlalelo ya maokelo, ga go na motho yoo a swanetšego go ba ka ntle mebileng go tloga ka iri ya senyane bošego go fihla ka iri ya bone ka masa.
tgt_text: nyalo sekukhona bufakazi lobucacile bekutsi kucala futsi kwekutsengiswa kwetjwala kube nemphumela nekucindzeteleka lokukhulu kwetibhedlela, lokufaka ekhatsi emayunithi ekunakekela timo letibucayi tetingoti nemaicu, ngenca yetingoti tetimoto, budlova kanye netingoti letiphatselene naloko.

src_text: re tšea magato a re tseba gabotse gore ga a amogelege ebile a bea mapheko maphelong a batho, efela a swanetše gore a tšewe gore re kgone go feta sehloa sa bolwetši.
tgt_text: ngenca yalokoke sesincume kutsi kute songe umtsamo wetibhedlela, kutsengiswa, kusatjalaliswa kwetjwala kutawumiswa ngekushesha.

src_text: ga go na ka mokgwa woo re ka efogago lephoto la coronavirus, efela re ka kgona go fokotša tshenyo yeo le ka e hlolago maphelong a rena.
tgt_text: njengesinyatselo lesengetiwe sekunciphisa kucindzeteleka kwetibhedlela, kutawubekwa sikhatsi lesingumncamulajucu wekungatfolakali ngaphandle emkhatsini wensimbi ye9:00 ebusuku nensimbi ye4:00 ekuseni.

src_text: bjalo ka setšhaba, re a thekgana, re thekga le bao ba lwalago ebile re hlohleletša kamogelo ya batho bao ba phelago ka baerase ye.
tgt_text: sitsatsa letinyatselo ngekwati kahle kamhlophe kutsi titawuletsa kuvimbeleka lokungemukeleki etimphilweni tebantfu bakitsi.

src_text: gabjale, le go feta peleng, re rwele maikarabelo a bao re phelago le bona.
tgt_text: nanome kunjalo, tidzingekile kute siphumelele kuncoba kulelizinga lelisetulu lekutseleleka ngalesifo.

src_text: re tla le fediša lephoto le.
tgt_text: kute lenye indlela yekugwema lesivunguvungu seligciwane lecorona.

src_text: re tla bušetša naga ya gaborena maemong a mabotse a maphelo, gomme ebile re tla ba le tšwelopele.
tgt_text: kodvwa singakhona kutsi sinciphise umonakalo lelingawubanga etimphilweni tetfu.

src_text: re tla fenya.
tgt_text: sita kutsi sivimbe kubhebhetseka kwecovid19 vukuzenzele unnamed sive sakitsi sibukene nenkinga lenkhulukati emlandvweni wetfu wentsandvo yelinyenti.

src_text: go keteka basadi ka go ba go keteka basadi ka go ba akaretša ekonomingakaretša ekonoming vukuzenzele unnamed ka phato afrika borwa e keteka kgwedi ya basadi.
tgt_text: kubungata bomake ngekubafaka kubungata bomake ngekubafaka kutemnotfokutemnotfo vukuzenzele unnamed ngenyanga yengci iningizimu afrika igubha inyanga yabomake.

src_text: tiragalo ye e dira matswalo a letšatši ka 1956 ge basadi ba 20 000 ba matšhetša union buildings – basadi ba bantši ba go bolela malema a go fapana, go tšwa mafelong a go fapana gomme ba mehlobo ka moka.
tgt_text: lesikhatsi sekugubha lusuku lwekukhumbula nga1956 ngesikhatsi bomake laba20 000 bashuca baya eunion buildings – sicuku lesikhulu sabomake lebe sikhuluma tilwimi letinengi, labe bavela etindzaweni letahlukene futsi bato tonkhe tinhlanga.

src_text: ba be ba kopane ka senyakwa sa bona sa go fediša melao ya dipasa le tokelo ya bona ya go phela ka tokologo.
tgt_text: bebabumbene bayintfo yinye kuloko bebakufuna kutsi kupheliswe imitsetfo lemibi yemapasi kanye nelilungelo labo lekuphila ngenkhululeko.

src_text: maemo le kemo ya basadi ka afrika borwa lehono a fapana kudu le ao bommago rena le bokoko a rena ba bego ba phela ka fase ga wona ka 1956. re tšwa kgole gore re be le afrika borwa ya go hloka semorafe, ya go hloka kgethologanyo ya bong, ya go huma gape yeo e lokologilego.
tgt_text: simo sabomake kanye nesikhundla sabo lapha eningizimuafrika lamuhla sesigucuke kakhulu kunaleso bomake betfu kanye nabogogo betfu labebabukene naso nga1956.

src_text: go bile le tšwelopele kudu mo go kaonafatšeng maphelo a basadi ba afrika borwa go ekonomi, lekala la dipolotiki le go bophelo bja setšhaba.
tgt_text: sesihambe libanga lelidze ekwenteni iningizimu afrika lengahlukanisi sive ngebuhlanga, ngebulili, yentsandvo yelinyenti, lephumelelako futsi nalekhululekile.

src_text: go le bjalo, re a tseba gore re sa ya kgole.
tgt_text: sekubekhona inchubekelembili sibili ekutfutfukiseni timphilo tabomake baseningizimu afrika kutemnotfo, kumkhakha wetepolitiki kanye nemphilo yabo emmangweni.

src_text: basadi ba sa lebane le kgethollo, tlhorišo le dikgaruru, gomme ba sa phela ka bohloki.
tgt_text: ngalokufananako, siyati kutsi kusasekunengi kakhulu lesingachubeka sikwente.

src_text: ge e le gore ka nnete re nyaka go diragatša tshepišo ya molaotheo wa rena re swanetše go lwantšha dikgato tse di dirago gore basadi ba se be le letseno le tšhelete moo go dirago gore ba ikhwetše ba kgotleletše go hlorišwa le go bethwa.
tgt_text: bomake solo basabukene nekubandlululwa, kugcagcalatiswa nebudlova, futsi ngibo labatsintfwa kakhulu buphuya.

src_text: re tsenetše lesolo la go ribolla leswika leo le re amantšhago le maitapišo a lefase a go fihlelela tekatekano ya bong ka 2030. tekatekano ya meloko ke agenda ya tlhohleletšo le phetogo go fediša kgethollo le dikgaruru kgahlanong le basadi le bana le go kgatha tema ka go lekana bophelong bja dipolotiki, leago le ekonomi.
tgt_text: nangabe sitawufezekisa ngeliciniso setsembiso semtsetfosisekelo wetfu, kufanele kutsi silungise kukhishelwa ngephandle kutemnotfo kanye nakutetimali kwabomake lokuyintfo leyenta bomake kutsi bahlaseleke lula nabahlukunyetwa kanye nebudlova.

src_text: bjalo ka karolo ya lesolo le, re kopantše ‘ditirišano tša twantšho’ tše pedi, yenngwe ke ya toka le ditokelo tša ekonomi ge ye nngwe e le ya kgahlanong le dikgaruru tše di ekadilego ka bong.
tgt_text: sesijoyine umkhankhaso loyinchophamlandvo losichumanisa nemitamo yemhlaba wonkhe yekufezekisa kulingana ngebulili nga2030.

src_text: bobedi ditabakgolo tše di bohlokwa go agenda ya rena ya bosetšhaba.
tgt_text: kulingana kwesitukulwane luhlelo lolunekulangatelela kwenta lokukhulu futsi loluguculako lwekucedza kubandlululwa kanye nebudlova lobucondzi swe kubomake kanye nekutimbandzakanya kwabo ngalokulinganako kutepolitiki, kutenhlalo nasemphilweni yetemnotfo.

src_text: dikgwedi tše 11 go tloga mola leano la twantšho la go arabela la tšhoganetšo go lwantšha dikgaruru tšeo di ikadilego ka bong le dipolao tša basadi (gbvf) ke banna le phethagatšwago go bonagetše tšwelopele go godiša thekgo le tlhokomelo ya bao ba phologilego, gomme go na le tšwelopele go kaonafatšeng molao go ba fa tšhireletšo ye kgolo.
tgt_text: njengencenye yalomkhankhaso, sijoyine ‘imifelandzawonye’ lemibili , yinye yebulungiswa kutemnotfo nemalungelo kanye lenye ngulemelene nebudlova lobucondziswe kubomake.

src_text: mo kgweding ya phato, re thoma ka phethagatšo ya leano la peakanyo la bosetšhaba go lwantšha gbvf ke banna.
tgt_text: totimbili letingcikitsi timcoka vele kuluhlelo lwetfu lwavelonkhe.

src_text: ntlha ya bohlokwa ya leano le ke go kgonthiša gore basadi ba bantši ba fiwa kudu menyetla mo ditšheleteng.
tgt_text: tinyanga leti11 kusukela lisu lekwenta kuphendvula simo lesiphutfumako lekulwa nebudlova lobeyamene nebulili kanye nekubulawa kwabomake lafezekiswa sesibe nenchubekelembili ekungeteni kusekela nekunakekela labo labahlukumetekile, futsi kunenchubekelembili leseyentiwe ekuguculeni temtsetfo kutsi bavikeleke kakhulu.

src_text: se ke ka gore go se lekalekane ga ekonomi le go se lekalekane ga leago go a sepelelana.
tgt_text: ngesikhatsi senyanga yengci, sicala ngekufezekisa lisu lavelonkhe lesibuciko lekulwa nebudlova lobeyamene nebulili kanye nekubulawa kwabomake.

src_text: maemo a basadi ka afrika borwa a ba dira gore ba be kotsing ya go hlorišwa.
tgt_text: luhlangotsi lolumcoka kakhulu kulelisu lumayelana nekucinisekisa kufaka kakhulu bomake kutetimali.

src_text: re swanetše go oketša thekgo ya basadi go ba kgontšha gore ba itirele tšhelete ya bona.
tgt_text: loku kungenca yekutsi kungalingani ngekwetemnotfo kanye nekung alingani ngekwetenhlalo kuhlangene.

src_text: re dirile maikgafo a mmalwa ka fase ga tekatekano ya moloko yeo e tla tšweletšago dipoelo ka leano la peakanyo ya bosetšhaba.
tgt_text: simo setemnotfo sabomake lapha eningizimu afrika sibenta kutsi bahlaseleke lula nabahlukunyetwa.

src_text: sa mathomo, re ya go tsentšha basadi mererong ya ekonomi ka go ba abela dithendara.
tgt_text: kufaneleke kutsi senyuse kwesekela kwetfu bomake kute kutsi bakhone kutimela ngekwetetimali.

src_text: re beile selebanywa sa go kgonthiša gore bonnyane dithoto le ditirelo tša go lekana 40% tšeo di rekilwego ke makala a setšhaba di tšwe dikgwebong tša basadi.
tgt_text: sesente tetsembiso letinyenti tekutinikela ngaphasi kweluhlelo lwekulingana kwesitukulwane letitawuphumelela ngekusebentisa lisu lavelonkhe lelisubuciko.

src_text: sa bobedi, re ya go oketša thekgo go dismme tša basadi le go basadi bao ba nago le dikgwebo tša mo mebileng goba bao ba sa šomego.
tgt_text: kwekucala, sitawuchuba kufakwa kwabomake kutemnotfo ngekutsenga kwahulumende kwenta loko.

src_text: se se tla akaretša go boledišana le makala a ditšhelete go dira gore ditirelo tša ditšhelete di fihlelelege le go rekega go basadi.
tgt_text: sesibeke umgomo wekucinisekisa kutsi lokungenani emaphesenta lange40 etimphahla kanye netinsita letitsengwa tikhungo tahulumende kumabhizinisi banikati bawo kubomake.

src_text: sa boraro, re nyaka go kgonthiša gore basadi ba bantši ba na le dithoto tša bohlokwa go swana le naga.
tgt_text: kwesibili, sitakwenyusa kwesekelwa kwemasmme laphetfwe bomake kanye nabomake labasebenta emkhakheni longakahleleki nome labo labangasebenti.

src_text: go bohlokwa gore basadi e be baholegi ba lenaneo le potlakišitšwego la poelo ya mafase.
tgt_text: loku kutawufaka ekhatsi kuhlanganyela nemkhakha wetetimali kute yenta kutsi tinsita tetetimali tifinyelele kubomake futsi tingabiti.

src_text: go bohlokwa gore go r75 milione ya diboutšhara tšeo di beetšwego kimollo ya covid19 ya kabo ya temo 53% ya baholegi e tla ba basadi ba magaeng.
tgt_text: kwesitsatfu, sifuna kucinisekisa kutsi bomake labanengi bayakhona kufinyelela kutfola timphahla letikhicitako njengemhlaba.

src_text: re swanetše go kgonthiša gore basadi ba balemi ba ka gae le ba bannyane ba tšwela pele go amogela thekgo ka morago ga leuba.
tgt_text: kubalulekile kutsi bomake kuba ngibo labazuzako eluhlelweni lolusheshako lwekugucula temhlaba.

src_text: sa bone, re nyaka go kgonthiša gore basadi ba šireletšwa go dikgaruru tšeo di ikadilego ka bong mo mošomong.
tgt_text: kubaluleke kakhulu kutsi kule tigidzi letinger75 tekuhhamula tecovid19 letibekelwe eceleni tekulima, emavawusha emaphesenti lange53 ebazuzi kufanele kutsi kube bomake basetindzaweni tasemaphandleni.

src_text: ka tsela yeo re tla ba re šoma legatong la bosetšhaba le la selete go tumelelano ya kopano ya ilo ka ga dikgaruru le tlhorišo mošomong.
tgt_text: kufanele kutsi sicinisekise kutsi balimi lababomake labalimela kutondla kanye nebalimi labancane bayachubeka kutfola kwesekelwa ngisho ngemuva kwalolubhubhane selwendlulile.

src_text: go thwe tokologo ga e fiwe, eupša e a tšewa.
tgt_text: kwesine, sifuna kucinisekisa kutsi bomake bayavikeleka ebudloveni lobeyame ebulilini etindzaweni tekusebenta.

src_text: tokologo ya basadi ke mantšu fela ao a lego letlakaleng ntle le ge e ka bapetšwa ke boikgafo go tšwa go makala ka moka a setšhaba.
tgt_text: ngaleyo ndlela, sitawube sisebenta ezingeni lavelonkhe kanye neletigodzi ekufeze kiseni sivumelwane somhlangano wenhlangano yetisebenti yemhlaba wonkhe mayelana nebudlova nekugcagcalatiswa etindzaweni tekusebenta.

src_text: ge re beakanya kagolefsa ya ekonomi ya rena mo tlhohlong ya leuba la coronavirus , re rile re ka se boele moo re bego re le gona pele ga go phulega ga baerase.
tgt_text: kutsiwa inkhululeko ayinikwa kodvwa iyatsatfwa.

src_text: re swanetše go aga ekonomi ye bohlokwa ya go fapana le yeo re bego re na le yona yeo, gare ga dilo tše dingwe, e kaonafatšago maemo a bohlokwa a basadi.
tgt_text: kukhululwa kwabomake kunga ba ngemagama nje lasephepheni nangabe akuhambisani nekutinikela kwayo yonkhe imikhakha yemmango.

src_text: se se ra gore peeletšo ya rena ka mananeokgoparara ga se ya swanela go thekga fela kaonafatšo ya diintasteri tša gae, eupša le dikgwebo tša basadi.
tgt_text: njengaloku silungiselela kwakha kabusha umnotfo wetfu ekubhedvukeni kwalolubhubhane lweligciwane lecorona , sishito kutsi ngeke simane nje sibuyele emuva lapho besikhona ngembikwekubhedvuka kwaleligciwane.

src_text: e swanetše go hlola dibaka tša mešomo mo magatong ka moka a peakanyo, go thekga ka ditšhelete, go aga le go hlokomela mananeokgoparara.
tgt_text: kufanele kutsi sakhe umnotfo lowehlukile mbamba, emkhatsini waletinye tintfo, lotawutfutfukisa ngalokuphatsekako simo sekuba nemphahla kwabomake.

src_text: ka tekanyo ya go swana ge re oketša thekgo ya mananeo a mešomo ya setšhaba, re swanetše go kgonthiša gore makgarebe kudu ba swanetše go ba bakgathatema.
tgt_text: loku kusho kutsi lutjalotimali lwetfu kusakhiwonchanti lufanele kutsi lungasekeli kuphela imboni yendzawo kodvwa emabhizinisi laphetfwe bomake.

src_text: godimo ga go hwetša letseno, mananeo a a tla ba fa sebaka go hwetša mabokgoni a mangwe le maitemogelo ao a hlokegago go kgatha tema ekonoming ye kgolo.
tgt_text: lufanele kutsi ludale ngenhloso ematfuba ekucashwa kwabomake kuto tonkhe tigaba tekuhlela, kusitwa ngetimali, kwakha kanye nekugcina esimeni lesisebentako sakhiwonchanti.

src_text: le ge e le maikarabelo a mmušo go aba dibaka tša ekonomi go basadi le go hlola tlhako ya go kgontšha go tšwetša pele tekatekano ya bong, mang le mang mo setšhabeng o swanetše go kgatha tema ya gagwe.
tgt_text: ngaleto tinyatselo letifananako, njengaloku senyusa kwesekelwa kwetinhlelo tahulumende tekucasha, kufanele kutsi sicinisekise kutsi bantfu labasha besifazane ikakhulu bayakhetfwa kutsi batimbandzakanye.

src_text: dikgwebo di swanetše go thekga dikgwebo tša basadi ka go reka mo go tšona dithoto le ditirelo.
tgt_text: kwengeta kumalingena, letinhlelo titawubanika litfuba lekutfola lamanye emakhono kanye nesipiliyoni lesidzingekako sekungena kutemnotfo letibanti.

src_text: di swanetše go thwala basadi ba bantši gomme ba thwale basadi ba bantši maemong a bolaodi.
tgt_text: nanome kusibopho sahulumende kunika bomake ematfuba etemnotfo kanye nekudala luhlakamsebenti lolukhona kuchubeleembili kulingana ngebulili, wonkhe umuntfu emmangweni kudzingeka kutsi adlale indzima yakhe.

src_text: se se bohlokwa kudu go lebeletšwe gore rekoto ya lekala la praebete mo go kemedi ya bong legatong la taolo e šaletše morago go ya lekala la setšhaba.
tgt_text: emabhizinisi kufanele kutsi asekele emabhizinisi laphetfwe bomake ngekutsi atsenge timphahla netinsita tawo.

src_text: ye ke taba yeo e tšweletšwago gantši mo dipoledišanong tšeo ke bilego le tšona le mekgatlo ye mmalwa ya dikgwebo tša basadi.
tgt_text: kufanele kutsi acashe bomake labanengi futsi acashe kakhulu bomake etikhundleni tekulawula.

src_text: gore re be le tekatekano re swanetše go fediša setlwaedi sa megolo ya go se lekane go ya ka gore motho ke monna goba mosadi gomme re lefa batho ba ba dirilego mošomo wa go swana ka go lekana go ya ka molao wa tekatekano ya mošomo.
tgt_text: loku yintfo lebalulekile lebonakalako kutsi lirekhodi lemkhakha lotimele lelimayelana nekumeleleka kwebulili esigabeni sekulawula kusasilele emuva kunemkhakha wahulumende.

src_text: basadi ba swanetšwe go šireletšwa go tlhorišo le kgethologanyo mošomong.
tgt_text: lena yindzaba lokukhulunywa ngayo njalo ngekuphindzelela ekuhlanganeni kwami netinhlangano temabhizinisi letinengi tabomake.

src_text: ke maikarabelo a basepediši ba dinamelwa, balaodi ba diyunibesithi, makgotlataolo a dikolo le mekgatlo ya sedumedi go hlola maemo a a bolokegilego go basadi le basetsana go ka tšea maeto, go ya dikolong le go ya dikerekeng.
tgt_text: ngesinyatselo lesilinganako, kufanele kutsi sikucedze kungalingani ngebulili emiholweni yemadvodza nabomake, sisebentise umtsetfomgomo lotsi umholo lolinganako wemsebenti lolinganako locuketfwe mtsetfo wekulingana emsebentini.

src_text: re swanetše go tšwela pele ka maitapišo a rena a go fediša go nyatšwa ga basadi ke banna, kgethollo ya basadi ke banna le go dira banna dihlogo.
tgt_text: bomake kufanele kutsi bavikelwe kutsi bangagcagcalatwa futsi bangabandlululwa etindzaweni tekusebenta.

src_text: ke mekgwa ye yeo e dirago gore go be le kgatelelo ya basadi.
tgt_text: kusemahlombe alabanetekutfutsa, baphatsi bemanyu vesi, imitimba lephetse tikolo kanye netinhlangano tetenkholo kutsi tidale kutsi kube netimo tekutsi bomake nemantfombatana bakhone kuhamba, kufundza kanye nekukhonta ngekuphepha.

src_text: go tšwa go rena – bobedi banna le basadi – go kgonthiša gore mohola wa mosadi, maemo le dikgopolo ga di fetwe ke tša monna.
tgt_text: kufanele kutsi sichubekeleembili ngemitamo yetfu yekucedza umcondvo wekudzelela bomake, umcondvo wekubukela phasi bulili kanye nemcondvo wekutsi labadvuna bancono.

src_text: ke maikarabelo a rena bjalo ka batswadi le bokoko le borakgolo go swara le go godiša barwa le barwedi ba rena go swana.
tgt_text: nguletindlela tekutsatsa tintfo letibanga kutsi kube nekucindzeteleka kwabomake.

src_text: go tšwa go rena bjalo ka banna go gana le go bolela kgahlanong le ditiragalo tša gbv ge re di bona, le ge e le gore di dirwa ke bagwera ba rena, bopapa ba rena goba bobuti ba rena.
tgt_text: kukitsi sonkhe – emadvodza nabomake – kucinisekisa lizingagugu lamake, sikhundla kanye nemibono yabo kutsi ayisingaphasi kweyendvodza.

src_text: a re beng moloko woo o fedišago kgatelelo ya basadi ka mekgwa ya yona ka moka, mo maphelong a rena.
tgt_text: kukitsi njengebatali kanye nabomkhulu nabogogo kutsi siphatse futsi sikhulise emadvodzana kanye nemadvodzakati etfu ngendlela lefananako.

src_text: moloko wa bagale wa 1956 o matšheditše rena ka moka.
tgt_text: kukitsi njengemadvodza kutsi singabuvumeli futsi sikhulume simelane nebudlova lobeyame ebulilini nangabe sibubona, ngisho nome ngabe bucondziswe kubangani betfu, kubobabe nome kubomnaketfu.

src_text: re a ba hlompha, rena le meloko ya ka moso ga se ra swanela go eke bohwa bjo bja go hlomphega.

src_text: se se tlile bjalo ka kimollo go maafrika bo rwa ka moka bao ba ilego ba swanela ke go phela ka fase ga dikiletšo tše tiišeleditšwego letsogo dikgweding tše tlhano tša go feta.
